meanings.definition: The act of removing something from a place.
meanings.sent1: During the removals, the old furniture was taken out of the house.
meanings.sent2: The removals of the boxes from the storage room went smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The removals of the noisy toys from the classroom made the students happy.
meanings.sent4: Her removals of negative thoughts from her mind helped her feel more positive.
meanings.sent5: The removals of the weeds from the garden revealed beautiful flowers underneath.

meanings.definition: The process of moving belongings from one location to another.
meanings.sent1: The removals of the furniture to the new house took all day.
meanings.sent2: We hired a company to handle the removals of our office equipment.
meanings.sent3: The removals of the heavy boxes up the stairs was quite a workout.
meanings.sent4: His removals of the fragile items required extra care and attention.
meanings.sent5: The removals of the books to the library shelves was a satisfying task.

meanings.definition: The act of taking away or eliminating something.
meanings.sent1: The removals of the trash from the park kept it clean and tidy.
meanings.sent2: The removals of the old policy led to the implementation of a new one.
meanings.sent3: His removals of the unhealthy snacks from his diet improved his health.
meanings.sent4: The removals of obstacles from her path allowed her to move forward.
meanings.sent5: The removals of doubts from his mind gave him confidence in his decision.
